original_title: Man Ray: Prophet of the Avant Garde
overview: Man Ray, the master of experimental and fashion photography was also a painter, a filmmaker, a poet, an essayist, a philosopher, and a leader of American modernism. Known for documenting the cultural elite living in France, Man Ray spent much of his time fighting the formal constraints of the visual arts. Rayâ€™s life and art were always provocative, engaging, and challenging.
title: Man Ray: Prophet of the Avant Garde
